title: Identification of new leads against ubiquitin specific protease-7 (USP7): a step towards the potential treatment of cancers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33080-33093
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06813K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sumaira Javaid, Seema Zadi, Muhammad Awais, Atia-tul Wahab, Humaira Zafar, Innokentiy Maslennikov, M. Iqbal Choudhary
Using biophysical methods small molecules were screened against USP7-CD and 12 compounds showed interactions with USP7-CD. These compounds bind with the putative substrate binding pocket and destabilize USP7-CD protein by negatively shifting the Tm.
